alert.note: Alert for Cherry; Sheridan (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 16 at 3:01AM CDT until July 16 at 4:00AM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: The National Weather Service in North Platte has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northern Cherry County in north central Nebraska... East central Sheridan County in the Panhandle of Nebraska... * Until 400 AM CDT/300 AM MDT/. * At 301 AM CDT/201 AM MDT/, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 9 miles east of Medicine Lake to 17 miles southwest of Merriman to 8 miles south of Gordon, moving southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * Locations impacted include... Medicine Lake, Valentine National Wildlife Refuge, Merritt Reservoir, Highway 61 crossing the Snake River, Steer Creek Campground, Big Hill, Morgan Lake, Lone Butte, Schoolhouse Lake, Highway 27 crossing the Niobrara River, Rock Hill, Intersection of Highway 27 and Mills Road, Anderson Bridge State Wildlife Management Area, Round Lake, Indian Hill, Intersection of Highway 61 and Shadbolt Road and Billys Lake. This includes the following highways... Highway 61 between mile markers 186 and 214. Highway 97 between mile markers 99 and 124. Highway 83 between mile markers 186 and 191. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
